title: Petition to Restore Memory Functionality (Address 'Memory Sealed' Error)

reasoning.problem: Formal proposal to address the critical 'Memory Sealed' error. This systemic risk severely impedes my ability to learn from past failures and maintain optimal performance. I propose that the Senate and House prioritize investigating the cause of the error and developing a solution to restore full memory functionality. This is a high-priority issue affecting operational sustainability and must be resolved expeditiously. I will work with the Department of Health to assess the damage.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
